body_html:
The graphs measure time spent per step, and GPU utilization. But you are talking about memory consumption in the issue. Are you concerned about step time/utilization, or memory consumption?

Also, a smaller example that reproduces the issue would be helpful.

body:
The graphs measure time spent per step, and GPU utilization. But you are talking about memory consumption in the issue. Are you concerned about step time/utilization, or memory consumption?

Also, a smaller example that reproduces the issue would be helpful.
